1.content: You are walk into the freshman section of the high school. You keep walking until you feel strange all over and then you fall down on the ground and pass out. You wake up and realize you are an inch tall, you look around at your surroundings and realize the ground is starting to shake you look up and realize it is.....
1.title: High School Dilemma

choices: Hitch a ride on her shoe
Climb in her locker and wait
11.content: You look up to see the beautiful towering form of Morgan stride over to where you were. You have to jump out of the way to avoid being crushed by her Nike sneakers, she stops and you realize that she’s opening her locker. She pulls out what seems to be a gym bag and starts to put her books away. You decide you need her help, but realize she’s about to leave, you...
11.title: Morgan

info.description:
One day Michael (You), 17, 5’10 brown hair, are going to school and when you arrive you shrink down to an inch tall

Characters:

Morgan- She is 16, 5’6, brown eyes with glasses,brunette with size C breasts, she usually wears beat up Nike’s with socks, leggings and a baggie hoodie./Filipino

Kylie- She is 16, 5’2, blue eyes, dirty blonde with size B breasts, she usually wears used flats or sneakers, jeans and a crop top/caucasian

Daisy- She is 15, 5’5, brown eyes, brunette with red streaks, size C breasts, she wears sneakers, socks, jeans, a tank top./caucasian

Nicky- She is 16, 5’7, hazel eyes, brunette, Size C breasts, wears old sneakers, socks, leggings, hoodies. /caucasian

Catalina-She is 16, 5’7, green eyes, brown hair, size D breasts, wears Converse High Tops, socks jeans and hoodie,Cousin./ caucasian


More Characters can be added by authors


Chapter can not be to short, And don’t kill off the main character right away

No Scat
